stories.original_headline: New drug resets the body clock and cuts jet lag recovery nearly in half
stories.original_summary: Scientists have identified a promising new compound, Mic-628, that can reliably shift the body’s internal clock forward—something that’s notoriously hard to do. By targeting a key clock-control protein, Mic-628 jump-starts the gene that sets daily rhythms, synchronizing both the brain’s master clock
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion to Vanquish Traveler's Fatigue!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Alchemists' Guild has concocted a powerful new elixir that resets one's internal sundial. This Arcane Elixir of Timely Tides helps weary travelers quickly recover from long journeys across distant lands. It can cut the time needed to adjust by nearly half, restoring balance to the body's mystical humors.

stories.original_headline: Scientists warn climate models are missing a key ocean player
stories.original_summary: Tiny marine plankton that build calcium carbonate shells play an outsized role in regulating Earth’s climate, quietly pulling carbon from the atmosphere and helping lock it away in the deep ocean. New research shows these microscopic engineers are largely missing from the climate models used to fore
stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Discover Missing Element in Realm's Weather Prophecies!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Sages warn that crucial little ocean sprites, known for weaving pearlescent shells, are overlooked in the realm's weather prophecies. These tiny creatures quietly draw dark mists from the sky, locking them away in the abyssal depths. Their absence from the celestial charts could lead to grave misunderstandings of the land's future climate.

stories.original_headline: OpenAI’s supposedly ‘leaked’ Super Bowl ad with ear buds and a shiny orb was a hoax
stories.original_summary: As if OpenAI didn't have enough drama around the Super Bowl and advertising, as the game wound down, word spread of a "leaked" ad that actually wasn't leaked at all; it was just a fake. Screenshots of a now-deleted Reddit thread told the tale of a frustrated employee who, while posting about how ups
stories.fantasy_headline: Oracle Guild's Grand Tournament Proclamation Revealed as Hoax!
stories.fantasy_story: Whispers spread of a secret proclamation from the Oracle Guild of Aether, showcasing new enchanted trinkets and a scrying orb. However, these tales shared among tavern patrons and town criers were mere trickery. The supposed "leak" for the Grand Tournament was nothing more than a charlatan's fabrication.

stories.original_headline: Super Bowl LX ads: all AI everything
stories.original_summary: Super Bowl LX is nearly here, with the Seattle Seahawks taking on the New England Patriots. While Bad Bunny will be the star of the halftime show, AI could be the star of the commercial breaks, much like crypto was a few years ago. Last year’s Super Bowl featured a Google Gemini ad that fumbled […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Arts Dominate Grand Tournament's Guild Pronouncements!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Tournament of Champions draws near, with famed legions preparing for battle. While a renowned bard will entertain at midway, the arcane arts and enchanted automatons are set to star in guild pronouncements. These magical displays are reminiscent of how mystical currencies dominated announcements just a few years past.
